assets.asset-factories-description: Asset factories are smart contracts that enable you to create and manage different types of tokenized assets. Each factory handles a specific asset class with tailored features and compliance requirements.
assets.choose-asset-types: Choose the types of assets you want to tokenize on your platform
assets.confirm-deployment-description: Please verify your identity to deploy the asset factories.
assets.deployment-warning: This action will deploy smart contract factories to the blockchain. Once deployed, they cannot be removed but can remain unused.
assets.description: Choose which digital asset types to enable on your platform

descriptions.bond: Tokenized debt securities with fixed income features
descriptions.equity: Digital shares representing ownership in companies
descriptions.fund: Investment fund tokens for pooled investments

assets.info: Select the types of digital assets your platform will support. You can add more asset types later.
assets.no-system: System not found. Please deploy the system first.
assets.select-all-asset-types: Select all the asset types you plan to tokenize
assets.title: Select asset types
assets.validation-error: Select at least one asset type
assets.your-asset-factories-ready: Your asset factories are ready for tokenization

wallet.description: Create your digital wallet and add security
wallet.title: Wallet

identity.confirm-description: Please verify your identity to create your on-chain identity.
identity.description: Required for identity registration and KYC verification
identity.intro:
Complete your identity verification to unlock full platform access. This ensures compliance with financial regulations (KYC/AML).

You can skip this for now, but you'll need to provide at least your country of residence to register your identity.

Your data is encrypted and used only for regulatory compliance.
identity.title: Add personal information

identity-setup.confirm-description: Please verify your identity to create your on-chain identity.
identity-setup.description: Deploying your identity contract to the blockchain
identity-setup.info: We're creating your ONCHAINID using the identity factory.
identity-setup.info-description:
This creates your identity smart contract on the blockchain—a secure container for your verified credentials.

No personal data is stored yet. That comes next. For now, we're establishing your unique identity address that only you control.

This typically takes 10-30 seconds.
identity-setup.success-message: Your blockchain identity is ready. Next, you can add your verified information to complete KYC compliance.
identity-setup.title: Creating your ONCHAINID

sidebar.description: Follow these simple steps to unlock the power of tokenization — from wallet creation to platform deployment.
sidebar.title: Your setup progress

system-assets.description: Enable bonds, equity, funds, and more
system-assets.title: Select asset types

system-settings.description: Set up system parameters and settings
system-settings.title: Configure system

wallet-recovery-codes.description: Save backup codes for emergency access
wallet-recovery-codes.title: Recovery codes

system.confirm-deployment-description: Please verify your identity to deploy the blockchain system.
system.deployment-details-description: View the details of the system deployment
system.deployment-warning: This action will deploy blockchain smart contracts and cannot be undone. Once deployed, the system will be permanently active on the blockchain.
system.initialize-subtitle: You're about to set up the foundation of the platform
system.token-factory: • Token Factory Registry for asset creation
system.trusted-issuers: • Trusted Issuers Registry for authorized parties

addon-deployment.description: Your addons are ready for use
addon-deployment.title: Add-ons deployed

airdrops.description: Enable airdrop functionality for your platform. This allows you to create airdrops for your assets.
airdrops.title: Airdrops

xvp.description: Enable XvP (Delivery vs Payment) functionality for your platform. This allows users to settle their positions using XvP instead of the default delivery vs payment mechanism.
xvp.title: XvP

yield.description: Enable yield functionality for your platform. This allows you to create yield-bearing assets like bonds and other fixed income products.
yield.title: Yield

addon-selection.addons-description: Addons are additional features and integrations for your platform. They can be enabled or disabled here.
addon-selection.confirm-deployment-description: Please verify your identity to deploy the addons.
addon-selection.description: Enable additional features and integrations for your platform
addon-selection.no-system: System not found. Please deploy the system first.
addon-selection.select-all-addons: Select all the addons you plan to enable
addon-selection.title: Enable add-ons

description.intro: Before you begin issuing assets, let's configure some basic settings that determine how the platform behaves. These default values help personalize the experience for you and your users.
description.update: You can update these preferences later in the platform settings.

baseCurrency.description: Choose the default currency for your platform
baseCurrency.label: Base Currency

toast.exchangeRateSyncWarning: Base currency saved, but exchange rates couldn't be synced. They will sync automatically later.

wallet.access-your-assets-description: View, manage, and trade your tokenized assets. While tokens live on the blockchain, only your wallet can control them.
wallet.address-explanation: Share this address freely—it's like an email address for receiving tokens. Transactions are public, but your identity stays private.
wallet.asset-control-description: Full control over your tokenized assets—view balances, track performance, and manage your portfolio.
wallet.authorize-transactions-description: Every action—buying, selling, or transferring tokens—needs your digital signature. This proves it's you without exposing your private key.
wallet.failed-to-create-wallet: Failed to create wallet. Please try again.
wallet.how-it-works: How it works (like a special bank card):
wallet.how-it-works-description: Like a bank card with a PIN, your wallet's private key lets you:
wallet.intro: Your wallet is more than storage — it's your master key to the blockchain. This unique cryptographic key proves you own your tokens and lets you authorize every transaction.
wallet.invest-in-digital-assets-description: Access tokenized equities, bonds, funds, and other digital assets from verified issuers.
wallet.manage-on-chain-identity-description: Your wallet anchors your verified identity on-chain, linking who you are to what you own.
wallet.manage-your-digital-assets-description: Buy, sell, transfer, and track all your digital assets in one secure platform.
wallet.security-importance: Your wallet controls valuable assets. Let's secure it properly.
wallet.security-next-steps: Next, you'll add authentication and save backup codes—simple steps that protect your assets and ensure you never lose access.
wallet.subtitle: Your digital key to the blockchain
wallet.success-message: Congratulations! Your Web3 wallet has been successfully created
wallet.wallet-address-description: Your unique blockchain identifier for receiving assets and interacting with smart contracts.

method-selector.choose-one: Choose the option that fits your security needs. OTP is recommended for maximum protection.
method-selector.description:
Like your bank card needs a PIN, your wallet needs protection too.

Choose between a quick PIN code or stronger one-time passwords (OTP) from an authenticator app.

otp.description: Uses an app like Google Authenticator to generate a new code every 30 seconds. Maximum security for your assets.
otp.title: OTP

pin.description: A 6-digit code you'll enter to authorize transactions. Quick and convenient for daily use.
pin.title: PIN code

method-selector.success: Great! Your security method is set.
method-selector.success-content:
You've successfully set up your {{method}}. This adds an important layer of protection to your wallet and keeps your assets safer from unauthorized access.

To complete your wallet security, the final step is to generate backup codes. These are secret recovery keys that allow you to regain access if you ever lose your PIN or authentication method.

Make sure to save these backup codes somewhere safe and private — they are your last line of defense.
method-selector.success-description: One more step to fully secure your wallet.
method-selector.title: Secure your wallet

otp.enter-code: Enter the 6-digit code from your app
otp.setting-up-description: Please wait while we generate your QR code.
otp.setup-description: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app
otp.setup-failed: Failed to get OTP setup data
otp.setup-failed-description: Failed to setup OTP authentication. Please try again.

pincode.description: Create a 6-digit PIN code to secure your wallet transactions
pincode.setup-failed: Failed to set up PIN code
pincode.title: Set up a PIN code

recovery-codes.description-2: These codes can be used to recover your wallet if you forget your pin or lose access to your authenticator app.
recovery-codes.title: Your secret codes
recovery-codes.warning: Important: Keep these codes safe! They're your only way to regain access if you lose other security methods.

welcome.complete-journey: Ready to complete your platform setup?
welcome.description: Transform real-world assets into secure digital tokens — all compliant, transparent, and completely under your control.
welcome.setup-description-new: In just 5 minutes, we'll help you set up everything you need to start tokenizing assets. Create your secure wallet, establish your blockchain identity, and configure your platform — it's easier than setting up a bank account, but far more powerful.
welcome.setup-description-returning: Just a few more steps to unlock your platform's full potential. We'll secure your digital wallet, establish your blockchain identity, and configure your platform — then you'll be ready to tokenize assets and transform how value is created and exchanged.
welcome.title: Welcome to your digital asset platform
